typeProperties.command:
.append SelectedJob with(tags='["test"]') <|
    CIS_Metadata_Job
    | where Workflow in ('BootstrapDCSeedingServerWorkflow', 'CreateVMandJoinDomainWorkflow', 'SetupCASeedServerWorkflow') and ParentId != '' and ParentId == RootId
    | join kind=inner WorkloadMapping
        on DisplayName
    | project JobId, ParentId, RootId, DisplayName, Cloud, Tenant, ServiceHostCapability,
        CreatedDate, StartDate, FinishDate, StateName, PackageId, Workflow, HostName, ServiceHostLocation,
        Timestamp, Notes, IsBlockingPathCandidate, IsBlockingPathPresent, ComponentOwnerId, OwningTeamId,
        Client, ParametersJson, SettingsJson, MdmId, TotalTaskCount, FinishedTaskCount, BlockedTaskCount,
        FinishTaskPercentage=1.0 * FinishedTaskCount/TotalTaskCount, FinishTaskProgress=strcat(FinishedTaskCount,"/",TotalTaskCount), 
        WorkflowName=Workflow, WorkloadDisplay, WorkloadName
